reviews.text: It is not too far from the port and the prédestrian of Koh Samet. As good as the Ao  Phai. Clean and less crowded. The mermaid park is so good place to see the sun rise.
Good
Beautiful Beach
This place is a lil expensive, but it is quite clean.
Great plage ma y animation late on night !

Beautiful resort, nice view, good rooms, great service and awesome small beach

Overall a place to come and relax for 3 days

Hotel placed at Ko samet island, on most beautiful beach - Ao Prao - that means cocount beach. All resort consist of many small houses- bungalow placed on different level. If you live in highest one, you have to step over 120 stairs from the beach, but a view from there, rewards everything. Otherwise, ater week, it will make you fit 😏

Beautiful place. 
The property is situated in a small cove, making the hotel and its 3 sister hotels the only properties in the cove. The hotel has complimentary speed boats 3 times a day to and from the island. Super stylish way to arrive. 

Staff was lovely. The Italian restaurant was very nice. We spent our trip snokeling, laying on the beach sipping pina coladas and chilling.

Perfect getaway place. 
So glad it's driving distance to Bkk.

Wow, the Ao Prao resort on Ko Samet was juet surreal. I came from Jomtien to Ko Samet for a few days and i was totaly flashed cause it looked like out of a movie. I totaly recommend spending a few days here if possible when you're in Thailand!
Nice snorkeling place near beach on left

reviews.author_name: แจ๊คปณิธาน ธนการรัชกร
reviews.text: อยากไป

My favorite place on this island. Few people, white beaches and beautiful scenery. By some reason very few people come here, instead the clump together at the main beach by the main road.

The resorts here are very cheap and "basic", still I got my gf to agree to move here a few days just to fall asleep from the sound of the waves and to wake up with the ocean right outside our balcony. If you can survive simple accomadations this is a hidden gem!
Very beutiful and quiet
Nice and warm
Clean and calm ! Relaxation at it best 👍
Наш любимый пляж. Чисто, море лучше чем на соседнем Малибу, не много людей, а главное нет, извините, толп китайских туристов...

The snorkel was quite poor for Thai standards (we went there in July), the water was milky with suspended sediment and the corals were not so impressive. The year before we went to the lower Gulf in the same month and the conditions were much better there.
Overpriced nice bungalows. Moody and flakey staff. Beach is seriously lacking. There is a small secret beach north of here that a scarce number of tourists have ever visited.
Nice for coral. A little dirty and beach small. Resort staff not friendly.  Ok just....

Beautiful resort, nice view, good rooms, great service and awesome small beach

Overall a place to come and relax for 3 days

Nice snorkeling place near beach on left

Loved this bar. An old school feel playing some cool music that bought back memories. The staff were super friendly and I had the pleasure of meeting some amazing people. I will miss you guys. Till next time xoxoxoxo

If I could give zero stars I would, we had great time yesterday, however today girls show up after hours at another bar and demand bar fine for owner,  owner is from the Netherlands and would not appreciate this, Good,  and Soon show up with other lady demanding  bar fine, other lady is ring leader, we leave then she shows up at other friends room from night before asking for more bar fine. The ladies were very nice until ring leader makes these girls steal from people, NAN who works the bar is very nice, but ladies steal from customers

If your a guy
.... It will become interesting 😉
Had a great night out listening to old disco hits with good people.
Very friendly staff, called the owner and he came in to change the TV stations. Food is good, drink prices are great. Simple and enjoyable.
Burgers are surprisingly good, and the physical set up is cool. Love the outdoor space.
Very fun. Great music and environment
Great burgers for half price on Friday!
Food was very underwhelming. Dry burgers with no seasoning. In my group there were about 6 burgers and nobody really liked them even during a BOGO deal.
Perfect for college students. Decently priced drinks with a dance / party atmosphere.

Loved this bar. An old school feel playing some cool music that bought back memories. The staff were super friendly and I had the pleasure of meeting some amazing people. I will miss you guys. Till next time xoxoxoxo
